snippet: The group, called the Hilltop Cares Foundation, is affiliated with the leadership of the Horace Mann School but will be independent of the school’s administration and its board.
abstract: Group affiliated with the leadership of the Horace Mann School announces the formation of the nonprofit group Hilltop Cares Foundation, which will help alumni who say they were victims of sexual abuse by Horace Mann teachers.
lead_paragraph: The group, called the Hilltop Cares Foundation, is affiliated with the leadership of the Horace Mann School but will be independent of the school’s administration and its board.

headline.seo: Horace Mann Victims of Abuse to Receive Aid From Nonprofit Group
headline.main: Nonprofit Group to Aid Horace Mann Alumni Who Say They Were Victims of Abuse
headline.print_headline: Group Says It Will Aid Mann Alumni
